short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: convert Ukrainian to Latin alphabet character, romanization, simple for easy reading/learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change Ukrainian letters to Latin letters, on website.
This extension automatically converts Ukrainian letters to the corresponding letters in the Latin alphabet.

This should be helpful for learning, reading. for studying Ukrainian language.
